specification.name: Zph
specification.description: You aren't one thing, one body, you are many. A group of tiny, bodies of many types and uses, controlled by one group intelligence. You. Your many bodies might have different purposes, designs, even origins. They might die, you might need new ones, but one thing had remained true for all those eons. You are still you.

flavorText.text: Consciousness is drifting now. Tiny parts in each body. Changing with the joinings, and dyings, and births of me. Now hive, now swarm, now spawn.

options.text: Bodies dying until who you were changed
You, other zph mingling ‘til you were one

questions.question: Choose one you want to remember from your long life
Choose one you want to forget from your long life
Choose two to describe your many bodies

Sacrifice some of your bodies to solve an immediate threat, no matter that you forget something when they die
Extend your bodies further afield to spy on something new
Let roughly half your bodies wander off to make a new zph

options.text: Bodies dying until who you were changed

specification.name: The Abductee
specification.description: One day a spaceship showed up on your uncontacted, backwater world and carried you away. Maybe you were in danger. Maybe there was a misunderstanding. Maybe it was a kidnapping. It's an old story. Abduction, for whatever reason.

flavorText.text: I was contemplating The Broken God, and his ways, when the spaceship arrived. Black and glistening with void menace over me. I was afraid.
flavorText.attribution: Nnedi ban'Xi, as quoted by Freetravelers, a Subversive Folk

options.text: Your name or your family's name
A language no one else speaks

A hobby everyone else thinks is weird

specification.name: Orbital Voidworker
specification.description: Superstitions abound about those that brave the out. Shipbreakers, hull patchers, spacing survivors. Not wise to look so long at void, dark things there, they say. Some fear you, others think you lucky, ethertouched.

flavorText.text: Drink vacuum, never fear the gods. Albatross, albatross, albatross again.

questions.question: Choose one practical skill you bring with you

options.text: Light and shadow bends near you
Orbits and ether are quiet near you
Sound deadens to silence near you
Some say Deep Wild Dark itself watches you
Some say dark deities lure you towards destiny

specification.name: Angel
specification.description: Something from outside wrote you into this universe's skin alone, without instruction. As a being of pure energy you are indestructible. But to interact with everything else, to have an identity, most angels, including you, have commissioned carved bodies for themselves. Fragile and fallible bodies that now shelter and identify you.

flavorText.text: Lo brethren! We are cast out in this universe of dark! Rise up! Rise together for the glory of all angelkind! Be the light to pierce creation!

questions.question: Choose two qualities of your physical body

options.text: It cannot do some physical actions
It's cracked, warped or marked by time
It's not perfectly beautiful like you were
You have altered it, but your body resists change

questions.question: Choose three limits imposed on you by physical your body

actions.description: Be limited by your body
Have your body hurt or break
Mourn for when you were immortal energy
Do something else as a being written into the universe
Momentarily have your energy leave your body to solve a problem
Move impossibly quick, be impossibly strong, defy the laws of physics, or otherwise break limits
If possible, modify your body

specification.name: The Snapcaster
specification.description: A snapcaster is someone who normally wouldn't have magic, etheric powers, someone who was never apprenticed. But snapcasters grew up or spent a lot of time around a black hole, a black matter wall, in the deep wild dark, or similar. You got this way, and got your powers, through accidental exposure.

flavorText.text: “Subject's flesh begins to increase dramatically in mass, likely towards nuclear degenerate matter. Isolation lost just after. Location unknown.
flavorText.attribution: Intercepted communique, Psmanthic Choir, RE Sinner Sun event

questions.question: Choose how your power was inflicted on you
Choose one you carry in you from your exposure

actions.description: Have the power and damage you carry in your body keep you from doing something

Be afraid or averse from magic and etheric sciences
Do something related to what was done to you, remind people it does not make you a witch or a wizard
Try to copy something supernatural one of your crewmates did, no matter how powerful
Try to manifest some small part of how you got your powers
Try to manifest how you got your powers, how it was inflicted, hurt yourself in the process
Break your bonds, be a terror

specification.name: Muscled Tough
specification.description: It's all well and good to magic, fly, science, and talk your way out of problems but let's be honest, the universe isn't always going to play nice. You're here for when it doesn't, for when people would threaten you, your ship, and the people you love.

flavorText.text: Yes, I fought on Winnipeg. Fought for SaintsCo when the Constabulary invaded, fought for the union when the Shrouds moved in, took over.
flavorText.attribution: Planetary Winnipeg slogan, prior to the Constabulary ousting SaintsCo

specification.name: The Prophesied
specification.description: A product of the chosen one industry, born to greatness, specifically bred for one thing, circumstances of creation and youth all controlled to produce an end product. Yet here you are Freetraveling. Not doing that. Why?

flavorText.text: “Welcome to Winnipeg! Leading the way in the chosen one industry with our patented corp oracles! If you're here, it's because we foretold it.
flavorText.attribution: Planetary Winnipeg slogan, prior to the Constabulary ousting SaintsCo

questions.question: Choose what you were meant to do
Choose what horror was done to make you

actions.description: Hide why you left, why you can't be what you were born to be
Feel pressure to do something, achieve greatness, save the day
Push yourself into a situation that does not need you to be there
Have flashbacks, fear you aren't doing what you were meant to
Do something neither embracing nor rejecting to your supposed great, glorious destiny
Be vulnerable, and with that vulnerability have someone else help you
Use a thing they forced you to do to actually solve a problem
Have someone help you because they believe your supposed destiny
Intimidate someone into helping you because of what you are
Break prophecy, reject the past, explain why you left

specification.name: Astral Gardener
specification.description: We're all systems. Emergent computer networks, emergent biospheres, ecosystems, biotech, biology, bodies. From the personal all the way to the planetary. You tend those gardens.

flavorText.text: Bodies contain ecosystems, which are contained in ships, such. Ecosystems. Which move in capitalism, kingdoms, cults, dimensions. Ecosystems.
flavorText.attribution: Rogue terraforming z-machine found floating in Deep Wild Dark

Choose one stem line
